title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with React and Tailwind CSS, featuring dynamic content loading from GitHub.

title: Physics Particle Simulation
description: An interactive particle physics simulation that demonstrates fundamental physics concepts through visual representations.

title: Machine Learning Research Tool
description: A tool that applies machine learning algorithms to analyze physics research data and identify patterns.

title: Puppy Classifier
description: Engineered deep learning models using CNNs and Vision Transformers to classify dog breeds, achieving ~88% accuracy. Enhanced model performance with transfer learning and advanced data preprocessing.

title: ICU Mortality Prediction Model
description: Engineering machine learning models to predict 30-day ICU mortality, handling complex time-stamped features. Improved model performance with mean imputation, L2-norm, and stratigied cross-validation and hyperparameter tuning.

title: Thread Library
description: Led team in implementation of C++ thread library, optimizing CPU scheduling and suspensions. Utilized Linux swapcontexts to enhance efficiency by eliminating excess swapcontexts. Designed multicore test cases to valdiate mutex, condition variable, thread, and cpu efficiency.
